For Work.title: Bug Magnet
For Work.description: Able to find bugs in code like they were placed there on purpose.

For Work.title: Console.log Guru
For Work.description: Uses console.log like a crystal ball to find any issue.

For Work.title: Shortcut Cheater
For Work.description: Knows every keyboard shortcut like they were born with them.

For Work.title: Merge Master
For Work.description: Merges branches in Git without conflicts, like a wizard during an exam.

For Work.title: Async Tamer
For Work.description: Handles asynchronous code and promises like well-trained pets.

For Work.title: CSS Tamer
For Work.description: Can make Flexbox and Grid work together like they were always best friends.

For Work.title: Time Hacker
For Work.description: Writes code at the last moment but always meets the deadline.

For Work.title: Layout Master
For Work.description: Creates perfect layouts on the first try, like they can read the designer's mind.

For Work.title: Documentation Whisperer
For Work.description: Understands cryptic documentation as if they wrote it themselves.

For Work.title: Feedback Master
For Work.description: Accepts client revisions with the Zen calm of Buddha.

For Work.title: Code Minimalist
For Work.description: Writes code so concise that one line does more than a whole file.

For Work.title: Pixel-Perfect Magician
For Work.description: Aligns elements to the last pixel, even when the design looks abstract.

For Health.title: Posture Levitation
For Health.description: Can sit for hours, but maintains perfect posture like a ballerina.

For Health.title: Step Master
For Health.description: Gets 10,000 steps a day even while sitting at the computer.

For Health.title: Snack Resister
For Health.description: Ignoring desktop snacks like a strict dietician.

For Health.title: Hydration Bot
For Health.description: Drinks the recommended 2 liters of water a day like a health-programmed robot.

For Health.title: Sleep Overlord
For Health.description: Sleeps 6 hours but feels like they had 10.

For Health.title: Break Guru
For Health.description: Takes a stretch break every hour without forgetting, no matter how focused.

For Health.title: Eye Protector
For Health.description: Can work all day at the monitor without feeling like their eyes are on fire.

For Health.title: Stress Dodger
For Health.description: Masters meditation right at the keyboard.

For Health.title: Yoga Coder
For Health.description: Easily switches from coding to yoga and back.

For Health.title: Healthy Snacker
For Health.description: Always picks fruit, even when chocolate is within arm’s reach.

For Health.title: Chair Exerciser
For Health.description: Manages to work out without leaving the chair.

For Health.title: Caffeine Filter
For Health.description: Drinks coffee at night and still falls asleep with no problem.

For Harmony.title: Joy Charger
For Harmony.description: Finds joy in the little things—even in a build that finishes unexpectedly fast.

For Harmony.title: Error Laugher
For Harmony.description: Laughs at code errors like they’re jokes instead of getting angry.

For Harmony.title: Bug Acceptance Guru
For Harmony.description: Accepts bugs as part of the journey to perfection — it’s just another task.

For Harmony.title: Spontaneous Coding Philosopher
For Harmony.description: Philosophically accepts any client suggestion after a long refactor.

For Harmony.title: Deadline Sage
For Harmony.description: Remains zen even when the deadline is close and the project manager is stressed.

For Harmony.title: Inspiration Maestro
For Harmony.description: Finds inspiration on an empty screen as if masterpieces are already there.

For Harmony.title: Peace Keeper
For Harmony.description: Maintains inner calm even in moments of intense crisis.

For Harmony.title: Empathy Guru
For Harmony.description: Feels the team’s mood and can lift everyone’s spirits.

For Harmony.title: Laughter Generator
For Harmony.description: Can lighten any tense situation with a joke that even bugs laugh at.

For Harmony.title: Pause Master
For Harmony.description: Knows when to just step back from the keyboard and breathe.

For Harmony.title: Coder Healer
For Harmony.description: Can support a colleague in their darkest hour, even if it’s a 500 error.

For Harmony.title: Music Code Curator
For Harmony.description: Creates work playlists so good, even deadlines follow the rhythm.
